eu.fbk.dkm.ckrdatalogrewriter.rl.ckr

Class CKRProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.dkm.ckrdatalogrewriter.rl.ckr.CKRProgram

  • public class CKRProgram
extends Object
    Version:
    1.3 Represents the output program of the translation. Contains references to the global and local programs and methods to compute and store the program.
    Author:
    Loris
